page.title: 18MEOLE BRACE PRIMARY SCHOOLS
page.content: The{Meole Brace}Primary Schools are in {Church Road}near the village church. The{Junior}School has been open for 3O years and now there are 248 pupils on roll. The first Headmaster,{Mr Bevan, still lives in the old school house in the village. The old Victorian school has been turned into a house. There are eight teachers and the Headmaster is{Mr Llewellyn.}The school has a sports field and two netball courts on the playground. It also has a library. The{Infant}School has 166 children in 7 classes. The Headmistress is{Miss H. {Oliver.}Some children start school at 4 years and 8 months and leave for the Junior School in the September they are 7. Every class in the school has a Wendy House, carpet area and reading area. There is a hall which is used for prayers, dancing, singing and P.E. Outside there is a big playground.
